scripts.start:example: npm run build && yarn --cwd packages/discussion-box link && yarn --cwd node_modules/react link && yarn --cwd ./example link react @eten-lab/discussion-box && yarn --cwd ./example && yarn --cwd ./example run start
scripts.start:storybook: npm run build && yarn --cwd packages/discussion-box link && yarn --cwd node_modules/react link && yarn --cwd ./example link react @eten-lab/discussion-box && yarn --cwd ./example && yarn --cwd ./example run storybook
